overview.en: Echoin is a public-chain ecosystem oriented to energy economy. It provides technical solutions based on blockchain technology for energy industry, and tries to construct a fair, free and convenient ecological foundation for energy economy participants including individuals, enterprises and developers.
overview.zh: Echoin是面向能源经济的公链生态，运用前瞻性区块链技术为能源行业提供技术解决方案，为个人、企业、开发者等不同角色的能源经济参与者，构建了公平、自由且便捷流转的生态底层。
